description: famille rose groups; two girls and a boy in Turkish dress after Meissen originals; girls with caps and fur trimmed gowns; boy in fez, green jacket and blue pantaloons; rockwork bases
dimension: .1 (male figure): H.5-9/16 x W.2-1/2 x D.2 in.; .2 and .3 (female figures): H.5-1/2 x W.2 x D.2 in. (each)
title: Two European Girls; European Boy
